data.title: Chorus (2015 film)
data.meta_description: Chorus is a 2015 Canadian drama film written and directed by François Delisle. It was screened in the Panorama section of the 65th Berlin International Film Festival. The film centres on Christophe and Irène, a former married couple still struggling to cope with the murder of their son eight years earlier.
